Title: Erased
Genre: Animation, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Actors: Ben Diskin, Shinnosuke Mitsushima, Michelle Ruff, Minami Takayama
Plot: 29 year old Satoru Fujinuma is sent back in time 18 years to prevent the events leading to his mother's death, which began with a series of kidnappings in his 5th grade year.
